name: Colorful tabs for windows 10
description: 将win10上的firefox标题栏变为彩色，完美处理右上角三个按钮的问题。 Make titlebar of Firefox colorful for windows 10, deals with buttons on top right corner properly. 感谢Fire_Marshall帮助解决关闭按钮问题 Thanks Fire_Marshall for solving the problem of closing button. 现加入移除未签名扩展的警告的功能 Now have the feature of removing warning of not signed extensions. 此样式仅在系统与firefox均为100% DPI下测试通过，其他DPI不匹配的设置可能出现严重的右上角三个按钮错位问题，请慎重使用！ This style have only be tested under 100%DPI, all other DPI may cause severe problem of titlebarbuttons on the top right corner, please use with care!
